author: solvedDev
name: Simple Block Rotation
description: Adds a new component that provides an easy way to rotate a block like a log.

author: Joel ant 05
name: More presets
description: Adds a new crop preset. Presets in this plugin require Minecraft beta 1.16.100.56+

author: Joel ant 05
name: Black and White Theme
description: Adds a black and white theme to select inside the settings window

author: Joel ant 05
name: Particle Example Snippets
description: Adds particle snippets

author: Joel ant 05
name: More Entity Snippets
description: Adds more snippets for entities

author: Joel ant 05
name: Fruity Themes
description: Adds different fruity color themes to select inside the settings window

author: Joel ant 05
name: Deep Blue Theme
description: Adds a deep blue color theme to select inside the settings window

author: Joel ant 05
name: Lime Theme
description: Adds a lime color theme to select inside the settings window

author: Gekocaretaker
name: Simply Json
description: More tools for your addons. From components to auto completions, this will make making addons easier. Look at the guide for help.

author: Joel ant 05
name: Volcanic and Aquatic Themes
description: Adds two new volcanic and aquatic color themes to select inside the settings window

author: Joel ant 05
name: Recipe Snippets
description: Adds better templates for custom recipes

author: JustSkitzo
name: Spooky Theme
description: Adds a new spooky color theme to select inside the settings window.

author: solvedDev
name: Custom Spawner
description: Implements a flexible custom spawner component to use on your entities. Requires active bridge. Core and Minecraft 1.13!

name: Create a Block
author: ENDERZOMBI102
description: Add a better 'template' for blocks.

author: JustSkitzo
name: Create an Item
description: Add a better 'template' for items.

author: solvedDev
name: Simple Tasks
description: All your tasks inside bridge. Supports pinning tasks and marking them as completed.

author: solvedDev
name: DarkBlue Theme
description: Adds a new dark blue color theme to select inside the settings window.

author: solvedDev
name: Bridge CommonWindow
description: Utility for other plugins. Wraps the bridge. Window API into an easier to use class.

author: solvedDev
name: Bridge Plugin Creator
description: Adds bridge. plugin files to bridge.'s native file creation window.

author: solvedDev
name: Bridge ConfirmWindow
description: Utility for other plugins. Uses bridge.ui.common_window to construct a confirm dialog.

author: solvedDev
name: Dynamic JSON
description: A compiler which can speed up creating repetitive JSON by writing loop statements and shared data inside the new "variables" state.

author: solvedDev
name: Dynamic Function
description: Adds the new /dynamicfunction & /func command which can be used to pass arguments to a .mcfunction file.

name: Console
author: solvedDev
description: Utility module to bring a console to bridge. plugins.

name: Crash Indicator
author: solvedDev
description: Displays which entities may cause crashes.

name: File Search
author: solvedDev
description: Quickly search all files of a project for specific keywords.
